data.message: If FB is gonna start chargeing then Im gonna delete my account & join twitter!!   Any 1 know if twitter charges?

replies.message: Hey Beau. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1tbT9ip. -Sarah

ok then I can breath a sigh of relief!!  Thanks for clearing that up!   I wanna ask somethin else while I have ur attention!!  Why was my videos of ufos - spirits - bigfoot taken off my paranormal page for?   Also can u make it mandatory to women about thier location - single status when they sing up?   Be cause I speak for thousands  of other single men!!  Thank u
